description: This is a test file using pytest to test the Recommendations API endpoints of a backend service. It verifies recommendation refresh, listing, and patching functionalities by making HTTP requests and validating responses. The tests involve interactions with a MongoDB instance to seed data and ensure correct API behavior.

methods.name: test_recommendations_refresh_list_and_patch_status( async_client: httpx.AsyncClient, mongo_db, create_test_instance: str, )
methods.description: An asynchronous pytest test function that verifies the refresh, listing, and status update of recommendations via API calls, ensuring correct response structure and data validation.
